title: As Europe rearms, ‘Made in India’ is entering the EU’s defence equation
summary_full: With the EU racing to expand defence production amid the war in Ukraine and growing uncertainty over US security guarantees, India’s fast-growing military manufacturing base is attracting attention in Brussels
summary_public: With the EU racing to expand defence production amid the war in Ukraine and growing uncertainty over US security guarantees, India’s fast-growing military manufacturing base is attracting attention in Brussels

BE.label: neutral
